text:
The Croatian Wikipedia is the Croatian language edition of Wikipedia. This edition was started in February 2003.
As of October 2015, it is the 41st largest edition of Wikipedia by number of articles.
, it has over 137,000 articles. In September 2013 Croatia's Minister of Science, Education and Sports, Željko Jovanović, said students in Croatia should avoid using the Croatian Wikipedia. It has been accused of using forgery to promote the former Ustaše movement.
